name: 2.2.0. Fixing dependencies.
body:
Fixing dependencies: scipy, numpy, pandas, networks.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/littleballoffur/compare/v2.1.12...v_20200

name: Pandas fix
body: - Fix pandas do be compliant with cython.

name: 2.1.11. ABC Connectivity check removal
body: Connectivity checks are cleaned up everywhere.
- Removed backend connection checks.

## What's Changed
* Flag for disconnected nodes.
* change initial num of nodes formula by @bricaud in https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/littleballoffur/pull/15
* Update setup.py by @mamonu in https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/littleballoffur/pull/16

## New Contributors
* @mamonu made their first contribution in https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/littleballoffur/pull/16

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/littleballoffur/compare/v_20008...v_20009

name: Fix docs.
body: Docs failing for wrong import.

name: BFS and DFS single node case.
body: - Added new tests and modifications.

name: Added Diffusion Sampler tree.
body: Added Diffusion Sampler Tree for Branching Process.

name: Diffusion sampler
body: - Add the new diffusion sampler with tests and references.

name: - Stability release
body: - Forest Fire Mods.

name: - Forest Fire fix
body: - Fire halting.

name: Optional starting node.
body: - Optional starting nodes for exploration sampling.

name: Networkit backend.
body: - Added abstract backend design.

name: Output types are enforced by assertions.
body: - Sample method NetworkX Graph type output enforced.

name: Needed to add the type asserions.
body: - Type hints are added for every class.

name: New assertion for alternative error handling.
Test integration and fixes
body:
- First general release.
- 100% test coverage.
- Travis CI.

name: Fix subsetting of Uniform Spanning Tree sampler
Fixed the exception handling.
body: - Fixed the exceptions.

name: Added Snowball
body: - SB

name: Added 5 samling techniques.
body:
- CNARW
- NBTRW
- BFS
- DFS
- LERW

name: Added 2 Sampling Techniques.
body:
- Partial edge induction.
- Common neighbor aware.

name: Added 3 Exploration Sampling Techniques.
body:
- Community Structure Sampler
- Circulated Neighbor Random Walk Sampler
- Shortes Path Sampler

name: Fixing the Frontier Sampler
body: Frontier sampler fixed.

name: First working release.
body: - Includes basic methods.
